rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0015
rows.name: Is the Cloud Sea higher than before?

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0003
rows.name:
Guess it must be what
they call high tide.

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0004
rows.name:
Because Gula moves on four
legs, the height of the
Cloud Sea changes, right?

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0005
rows.name:
Sometimes the Cloud Sea only reaches
the feet of Gula Divine Beast...

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0006
rows.name:
And then there are times
like now when it comes all
the way up to its belly.

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0007
rows.name:
With the cloud level this
high, we won't be able to
get back to our campsite.

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes... It's probably
submerged in the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0009
rows.name:
But since the Divine Beast continues
to move, eventually the Cloud Sea's
height will return to normal, right?

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0011
rows.name:
I'd heard about this
phenomenon, but it's
incredible to witness firsthand.

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0012
rows.name:
You don't get phenomena like
this in Avaritia, or in
Liberalitas, that's for sure.

rows.label: fev02_100_125_msg0014
rows.name:
Stop standing around amazed
and let's get moving. The
Torigo town is just up ahead.
